snippet.title: Slay Bells (2019) Game Release Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD FOR FREE on Itch.io here: https://blakemckinnonproductions.itch.io/slaybells

Slay Bells is a Christmas-themed survival horror game inspired by 80's slasher movies and PS1 horror games. 

Try to make your way home on Christmas eve as you're stalked by a maniacal axe wielding Santa who is out for BLOOD. Traverse city streets, back alleys and an abandoned subway station, find a variety of useful tool and weapons and avoid Mr Claus at all costs!

Oh, and the flashlight does NOT run out of battery.

ITCH.IO ► https://blakemckinnonproductions.itch.io/
GAMEJOLT ► https://gamejolt.com/@BlakeMcKinnonProductions

MY WEBSITE ► https://www.blakemckinnonproductions.com
MY BLOG ► https://blakemckinnonproductions.blogspot.com
TWITTER ► https://twitter.com/blakemprods 
INSTAGRAM ► https://www.instagram.com/blakemproductions/
